mapper.insert: insert into orders(id, code, userid, filmid, roomid, price, brand, begintime, endtime, captcha, status, o_score, comment) value (#{id}, #{code}, #{userid}, #{filmid}, #{roomid}, #{price}, #{brand}, #{begintime}, #{endtime}, #{captcha}, #{status}, #{o_score}, #{comment})
mapper.select: select o.*, u.name, f.filmName, r.styleBrand, r.spaceBrand from orders o left join usertable u on u.userId = o.userid left join film f on f.id = o.filmid left join room r on r.id = o.roomid order by id desc

select o.*, u.name, f.filmName, f.pic filmPic, r.styleBrand, r.spaceBrand from orders o left join usertable u on u.userId = o.userid left join film f on f.id = o.filmid left join room r on r.id = o.roomid
u.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and f.filmName like concat('%', #{filmName}, '%')
and o.userid like concat('%', #{userid}, '%')
and o.status = #{status}
order by id desc

select o.*, u.name, f.filmName, r.styleBrand, r.spaceBrand from orders o left join usertable u on u.userId = o.userid left join film f on f.id = o.filmid left join room r on r.id = o.roomid where o.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update orders set status = #{status}, o_score = #{o_score}, comment = #{comment} where id = #{id}
